name: Block Burst
description:
Works great on iPad too!

NEW!!! Unlimited Gameplay Option, so you do not have to race against time!

The goal is to blow up the flashing blocks within the time limit. Blocks blow up when at least three blocks of the same color are stacked or placed in a row.

Take on a friend via bluetooth!

This game works on all platforms back to iOS 3.0!

Features:
-4 difficulty settings
-3 speed variations
-Play multiplayer with one person via bluetooth
-Select from 3 different music selections
-Keeps total wins and losses

Check out these other great apps!
-Juke-FREE!
-Harvest Rush
-Pitch
-Pitch 10 Point
-Bank Account
